name: An exquisite hammered dulcimer
data: It has weak weapon class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users charisma a good amount.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It is a relic of the First Expedition.
Turning a knob on the side of the box causes the dulcimer to play
itself, much like a music box. The dulcimer's tune is a song unknown
